titleInfo.title: Dining Room at National Home for Jewish Children

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 5 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Typed on back of photograph: ''Refreshment in the special dining room for underweight children., National home for Jewish Children at Denver, 1931.'' Handwritten on back of photograph:''#388, B'nai B'rith, Always a snack for the children after school., Saul Halperin, Rosie Glassman, Esther Milstein, Sammy Greenstien.''

mods.abstract: Seven children sit around tables while a small boy sits in a highchair and a woman looks on in the special dining room for underweight children at the National Home for Jewish Children. Identified children are Saul Halperin, Rosie Glassman, Esther Milstein, and Sammy Greenstien.

name.namePart: National Home for Jewish Children in Denver

mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
